structure.unit: Industrial Development Of Cities And Towns

law.catch_line: Pollution Control, Cogeneration, And Small Power Production Facilities; Grants Or Loans
law.text: A municipality acting by and through an authority in connection with a project for pollution control facilities, cogeneration facilities or small power production facilities financed or to be financed under this chapter may apply for and accept and use any grant, loan, or grant and loan of federal or state funds for such pollution control facilities, cogeneration facilities or small power production facilities.
